Text:
The region was left on the image so many north american players wont even read it properly. I have used DVD Shrink to try and re-image it and take region off but so far nothing.

Probably good quality being the size of it but not being able to play it is crap :(

Ok so yes if you import the ISO into DVD shrink and take out the region code proper it makes it playable I tested it out and its working now :D

Cheers for those of you who run into this problem.
